author: Andres Carrero Cardenas

text: @Andres Carrero Cardenas Honestly I tire of Sakuraba's samey tracks on Tales, though he can obviously do better (see dark souls, Resonance of Fate, etc). Go Nagai has his own style, but he always does something unique..
author: itsacharcoalice

text: @itsacharcoalice Anyway it's obvious for anyone who's got ears that Go Nagai's work on Legendia is better than anything Sakurara has done for the series. Don't get me wrong I like(d) Sakuraba, but the Tales series clearly had generic soundtracks and is probably amongst his least notable works (compared to Valkyrie Profile, Baten Kaitos or even Golden Sun :/). Tales of is a bit how to do easy money for him.   Legendia is the only exception and is probably one of the best (and most sophisticated) video game osts in the last 10 years, with NieR, and probably some others. It's a shame the game is so average.
author: xenotypos

text:
@xenotypos You mean Go Shiina guys, Go Nagai is more into vintage manga. A tasteful mistake though.


There's some really good tracks from Sakuraba in the Tales of series, but there's also a limit at how much you can squeeze a composer I guess. Legendia was a breath of fresh air, I'd like to see Go Shiina being given free rein more often, his God Eater works are very good too.
author: Young_Lion

text:
@Young_Lion wut, you're totally right.
I don't even understand why the hell I wrote Go Nagai since I actually barely know him, while usually I really like to talk about Go Shiina. This case is a weird one ahah.
author: xenotypos

text: Go Shiina did a great job with this OST. It was something new rather than Sakuraba's recycled melodies. Not that I hate Sakuraba, I just think it's nice to let some else someone shine every now and then. Sakuraba and Go Shiina will be working together for Zestiria's sounds track.

author: Rufei

text:
@babydragon82 My thing with Legendia was that I absolutely loved the music (I will agree with you that it has the best soundtrack, ToA coming in second), and the characters and story were fantastic, but the battle system wasn't as great compared to the other Tales games and the dungeons were WAY WAY WAY too long. Scenery porn can only distract me for so long, you know?
Still, it's only a not-great game when compared to other Tales games. It's still a fantastic game. =)
